name: avoo-svelte-ssg-template
description: A template for a basic site generator build with awoo and svelte.
author: zipang

scripts.sync-assets: sync-files theme/assets public/assets && sync-files theme/admin public/admin && sync-files media_upload public/medias && cp theme/*.* public/
scripts.build: yarn run clean && build/build.js && yarn run sync-assets && yarn run build-css && ls -l public/assets/css
scripts.watch: sync-files --watch theme/assets public/assets && sync-files --watch theme/admin public/admin && sync-files --watch theme/config.yml public/config.yml
